author: Ed Kilgore
title: Fear of the Coronavirus Is Not Enough to Get a Texas Mail Ballot
description: New Hampshire Republicans say a reasonable fear of death is a “disability” which justifies use of an absentee ballot. Texas scoffs at that.
content: Last week I wrote about the two top election officials in New Hampshire, both Republicans, announcing that anyone afraid of being infected with coronavirus could vote by mail under a loophole allowing this method of casting ballots for those with a disability… [+3936 chars]
